original_text: He judges people fairly as he sees the things that they do. He gives people what they deserve. He judges people fairly as he sees the things that they do. He gives people what they deserve. He judges people fairly as he sees the things that they do. He gives people what they deserve. He judges people fairly
korean_text: 사람의 행위를 따라 갚으사 각각 그의 행위대로 받게 하시나니

sentences.original_text: as he sees the things that they do
He gives people what they deserve
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 사람들이 마땅히 받을 것을 준다
